name: Infinite Joyride
description:
This is my first game and was developed in 1 hour so it has limited features in this Build.  I will continue working on it to bring all the features I had envisioned here (link coming soon). 

The first update will add volume controls and is a high priority for me.  (The current audio level is 25%, and it is still super loud!)  Update tv1.1 reduces volume a ton!

How to Play: Dodge the falling traffic cones and last as long as you can.

Controls:

  • Move Left:  A   - or-  Left Arrow
  • Move Right:  D  - or- Right Arrow

 Assets Used:

  • Car and Cone Graphics  - Racing Pack from Kenney.nl
  • Font - Brassiere Font Family
  • Background Music- Licensed via Jamendo SA
